product_overview: Bravita is a performance-oriented e-commerce platform built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, enabling users to browse products, manage their cart, and place secure orders with a seamless user experience.
core_goals: Provide a secure login and signup system protected by hCaptcha for both individual and corporate users.
Execute flawless cart management with optimistic UI and localStorage synchronization.
Offer secure payment and order flow validated on the backend using Supabase RPC.
Implement an advanced admin panel for order tracking and audit log management.
key_features: Authentication system with email/password login, signup, OTP verification, profile completion, and mandatory hCaptcha integration.
Product display with detailed descriptions, pricing, and call-to-action buttons.
Cart management supporting real-time product addition, quantity adjustment, and deletion with enforced stock limits and accurate total price calculation including VAT and shipping.
Checkout flow allowing address selection, promo code application, and order confirmation with backend validation of promo codes and prices.
User profile management including personal settings and address book functionality.
Admin dashboard enabling order listing, shipment tracking number entry, order status updates, and access restriction for non-admin users.
user_flow_summary: Users register or login using email and password protected with hCaptcha; validation includes handling incorrect credentials, empty fields, and session expiration.
Users browse products, add items to cart, adjust quantities, respecting stock limits, and view real-time price updates including applicable taxes and shipping.
During checkout, users select their address, apply discount codes that are verified by the backend, and confirm their orders.
Admins login to the dashboard, view all orders, update shipment tracking numbers, and manage order statuses; non-admins are prevented from accessing admin pages.
validation_criteria: No authentication form (login/signup) can be submitted without passing hCaptcha validation.
Cart totals including taxes and shipping fees must be accurately computed in all scenarios.
Cart contents must persist without loss even after page reloads thanks to localStorage sync.
Clear and informative error messages must be shown for invalid promo codes or insufficient stock situations.
When shipment information is updated by admin, database records must be accurate and confirmation emails sent to users accordingly.
